name: Rat Rumble
description:
Your lab rats have mutated and stolen your inventions! Shoot through the sewers of mutant rats and find upgrades as you search for your missing equipment. Rat Rumble is a short format retro style first person shooter game. explore the sewers, find all of the power ups, and defeat the evil rat boss!

This is our first published game (clearly!), and was a small project from 3 first time devs. Please feel free to give us feedback as we are open to updating the game!

Thanks to Arthur Vyncke and Darren Curtis for the use of the music!

Arthur Vyncke - https://soundcloud.com/arthurvost -Ghost of the Kitchen Darren Darren Curtis - https://www.darrencurtismusic.com/ -Swing Like Me -He's Changing the Game
